name: Scrap Scrounger
description:
Welcome to Noxis 4!

It's a lovely little junk planet that's perfect for salvaging operations. Your mission is to collect enough scrap before time runs out. The planet's terrain is difficult to traverse and it will slow you down but that's ok. You can always use the scrap you've collected to upgrade your vehicle!

Controls:

  • Press up to move forward
  • Press down to reverse
  • Use the left and right keys to turn left and right
  • WASD also works for movement
  • Press space to honk the horn

Concepts:

  • Drive over sparkling bits of scrap to pick it up.
  • If your vehicle's capacity is full, you won't be able to pick up additional scrap.
  • Deposit scrap by stopping on the yellow circle in front the factory you start at.
  • Drive onto the other yellow circle on the right side of the factory to open the upgrades menu.
  • Upgrades are bought with the scrap currently onboard your vehicle. Deposited scrap cannot be used.

Sources used

  • All three music tracks present in the game are from the System Shock soundtrack, composed by Greg LoPiccolo and Tim Ries.
